resource.name: CorStat - Data Inventory
resource.description: The dataset inventory provides a list of data maintained by departments within the City of Corona. The inventory will be used to track progress toward meeting plan goals for each department as well as achieving the goals of the City's overall strategic plan.
columns_description: Identifies whether the dataset has been made visible to the public or not.
The department who owns the dataset.
The unique identifier given to each dataset.
The unique ID given to the dataset during publishing automatically by the open data platform.
An overall description of the dataset.
A link to reach the dataset.
How often the dataset is updated.
States whether the dataset is officially published by the City of Corona or if it is made by community members.
How the dataset is published: manually or by automation.
Identifies how the departments are using the dataset.

resource.name: CorStat - Climate Action Plan Tracking
resource.description:
Total greenhouse gas reductions measured in CO2e measured against state measures and target goals for the City of Corona. Permits and projects are measured by the date they were applied for. Data is extracted from the City's permitting software, TRAKiT and is automatically updated and imported into CorStat on a nightly basis.

Note: This dashboard and the infrastructure created to measure greenhouse gas reductions was created in April 2019. Data used in this dashboard is grouped monthly from 01/01/2019 until 03/31/2019. From 04/01/2019, data is updated daily.

resource.name: CorStat - Library Patronage & Assistance V2
resource.description:

This system is updated real-time by dispatch and file personnel in the field. Due to this change, the data displayed on this dashboard is current up to 07/08/2019. We appreciate your patience as we work to correct this issue.
Update Frequency: Daily
